node.title: Autopsy finds no evidence of drug use or foul play in Bob Saget's death
node.description: The cause of comedian Bob Saget's death remains a mystery, with a post-mortem examination finding no evidence of drug use or foul play.
node.content:
["An autopsy\u00a0performed on the body of late comedian\u00a0Bob Saget has found no evidence of drug use or foul play.\u00a0", "Sagat was found unresponsive in his hotel room in Orlando,\u00a0Florida, after performing\u00a0a show earlier in the evening.\u00a0", "The Orange County coroner's office said the resulting\u00a0post-mortem examination found nothing untoward.\u00a0", "\"Our condolences go out to Mr Saget\u2019s loved ones during this difficult time.\"", "Saget was 65 years old. An investigation into his death is ongoing because\u00a0it is believed he died in his sleep.\u00a0", "
Co-stars, colleagues share memories
", "There has been an outpouring of grief following the death of the comedian and actor, who was known for his role\u00a0in Full House\u00a0and as the narrator on How I Met Your Mother.\u00a0", "\u201cBob was the most loving, compassionate and generous man,\" Full House co-stars Ashley and Mary-Kate Olsen wrote in a statement.", "\"We are deeply saddened that he is no longer with us but know that he will continue to be by our side to guide us as gracefully as he always has.\"", "Another\u00a0co-star, John Stamos, wrote on Twitter: \"I am broken. I am gutted. I am in complete and utter shock. I will never ever have another friend like him. I love you so much Bobby.\"\u00a0", "", "
John Stamos (right) said he was \"gutted\" by Bob Saget's (left) death.\u00a0(AP:\u00a0Jordan Strauss)
", "Candace Camera Bure, who also played one of Saget's daughters in Full House wrote: \"I don\u2019t know what to say. I have no words. Bob was one of the best humans beings I've ever known in my life. I loved him so much.\"", "How I Met Your Mother co-creator\u00a0Craig Thomas said: \"I don\u2019t even know what to say about Bob Saget. I loved him and was so lucky to work with someone so funny, soulful and kind. His role on HIMYM was a voice in the future, looking back on all of life's complexity with a smile, and that's how I\u2019ll always remember him.\"\u00a0", "Actors from the series also remembered the voice of Ted Mosby.\u00a0", "Josh Radnor, the actor who played the same but younger character in How I Met Your Mother, wrote: \"I'm endlessly grateful that HIMYM brought Bob Saget into my life. I\u2019ll hear his voice in my head for the rest of my days.\"\u00a0", "Neil Patrick Harris wrote: \"Absolutely stunned to hear about Bob Saget. He was always so kind and generous and hilarious. Gone too soon.\"", "While actor and comedian Jim Carrey also shared on Twitter:\u00a0\"He had a big, big heart and a wonderfully warped comic mind. He gave the world a lot of joy and lived his life for goodness'\u00a0sake.\""]
